value:
$WmMPID_比翼リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_MF_Pair,Face|The Day of Devotion is not so simple
for ones such as you and I.$k$pWe who have fought for the ones
we loved, only to—$k$p$nMPID_スラシル味方|Yes. We are shadows cast by love...
a place devoid of love's light.$k$pLook. Over there... It's the you
of this world.$k$p$nMPID_比翼リーヴ|Yes. And with his family as well...
And $Nu...$k$pLet's move.$k$p$nMPID_スラシル味方|...$k$p$nMPID_比翼リーヴ|...What is it, Veronica?$k$p$nMPID_スラシル味方|Although you are both Alfonse,
you... Well, it's sad.$k$p$nMPID_比翼リーヴ|Pointless to think about now.
As you say, we are little more
than shadows.$k$p

$WmMPID_愛の祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Valentine21,Face|Hey, you!$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル味方,ch00_17_Lif_MF_Pair,Face|Ah! Princess Veronica.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Valentine21,Face|I knew it. So, then, you are me from
another world... Why are you here?$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル味方,ch00_17_Lif_MF_Pair,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Valentine21,Face|...It doesn't matter. Here.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル味方,ch00_17_Lif_MF_Pair,Face|...Flowers? For me?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Valentine21,Face|My gift to you.$k$pOh, also, we defeated Hel, as was
promised. That is all.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル味方,ch00_17_Lif_MF_Pair,Face|I understand.$k$p$nMPID_比翼リーヴ|...As promised?$k$p$nMPID_スラシル味方|Yes. Before I, well...Veronica made
me a promise. She promised to see
Hel dead.$k$p$nMPID_比翼リーヴ|I see. How strange to be saved
by yourself from another world...$k$p$nMPID_スラシル味方|It's true.$k$pNow, Alfonse, shall we make our
return? A festival such as this is
no place for us.$k$pSomeday, though, it would be nice
to live in a world touched by love's
light once more...$k$p
